name: Luna Trap
description:
Gamejam entry for Mini Jam 130: Luna https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-130-lunar

It's supposed to be set inside the moon - imagination required!

The limitation is 10 seconds and even if it's the obvious route to go down I can't resist a time loop!

WASD to move, use your past selves to press the buttons down.

Whatever you think about this game, at least it's short!
